name: Abstract Marathon
description:
This was my first ever game that I made in 2021. I recently decided to recreate the entire thing, with some changes. It still has a few minor bugs, but other than that, it's fully playable! Have fun!

If you get bored of the main levels, then you can try out endless mode :)

Controls:

"A" and "D" 

or arrow keys

or touch controls (can be disabled in settings)

---Credits---

Main programming 

-me

UI Art 

-carrot fury

Music

-Antekwy and oli koty

Playtesting

-oli koty and a few other friends

Original version on Unity Play:
